name: Meli Estiatorio
address: 98-31 Metropolitan Ave, Forest Hills, NY 11375, USA

reviews.text: Ran into this place randomly and I don‚Äôt regret it at all. I think it‚Äôs one of my top Greek restaurants at the moment. The atmosphere and customer service is awesome. They treat you very well with respect. The place is extremely clean with nice music as well.
Such an amazing place! Great food, great servers, great music. I highly recommend it!
Great drinks, delicious food and excellent service!
We love Meli! Phenomenal restaurant! Beautiful ambience, great wine list and fantastic food! We‚Äôve been here for date nights and for large parties, service is always fantastic!
LOVED. The dips, the feta, the beer salad and the swordfish were amazing. Beautifully decorated. We will be back!

This restaurant definitely deserves 5 stars. The staff was so pleasant from entry, to the bar, to the table.
The customer service was amazing from each and every staff member. Our waitress' name was Liz and she was so sweet and helpful. And she gave us great suggestions from the menu. We enjoyed every dish we ordered.
The restaurant is so beautiful and clean. It gives the feeling of being in Greece. I loved the decor and the ambiance overall.
I will definitely be visiting again.
Everything was just as good as it looked in the photos! The Farm Mule drink was delicious, and the fries were amazing. I‚Äôll definitely be back.
Ten out of ten for everything, no notes
This is definitely one of my favorite new restaurants great, food service and ambiance.
The food was great and Liz was amazing!
Gem of restaurant. Really nice New York experience.

I discovered this new Greek restaurant by chance on Google Maps, and I‚Äôm so glad I did! The atmosphere is beautiful and inviting, and the food was absolutely delicious. We ordered saganaki to start, then shared the branzino fillet, a salad, and lemon potatoes as our main dishes. The portions were very generous and flavorful ‚Äî more than enough for two people to share, and we still couldn‚Äôt finish everything! Service was also very good. Overall, a wonderful experience and I will definitely be coming back.
Amazing fries, fantastic zucchini chips. Beautiful decor.
Lisbeth was a great waitress and super attentive despite the restaurant being so so busy. The food was great especially the meli chips and the octopus. The bathroom was large and clean.

I hope you get Liz as your waitress! She is top tier service and so attentive to guest needs. She makes your dinner extra special and there is nothing you have to ask for. She notices when you may need another cocktail. Your water glass is always full. In addition, if you are stuck on something with the menu she is happy to help and her recommendations are superb!
Food was delicious! Ordered the Lobster Pasta and had a Lychee Lime mocktail. Our server Liz was fantastic.  Loved the aesthetic of the place!
I love the food one of the best experience I love the place. I love the music and the service, Lis. She was one of the best service until I finish. She was on point with everything.

Excellent service and great ambiance. The place is beautiful
.
Lis was amazing great vibes from her! Food was great!!

I would like to say this was an amazing experience, food & hospitality. I came across this particular restaurant searching for a place for my mother‚Äôs birthday. Liz was lovely! She was attentive and took time to explain the dishes that are served here. My family and I had a great dinner. And the food was amazing!!! Definitely will be back.
This place is DELICIOUS! From the drinks, appetizers and entres! The wait staff is phenomenal. Highly recommend 10/10!
The waitress was friendly and highly attentive. Also , the food and ambience was really great! Beautiful setting
Incredible food and service...absolutely amazing every thing was home made

The ambiance, quaint
The service, wonderful & attentive
The food, tasty and portioned right!
I would definitely visit here again. Perfect date night.

We celebrated my mother's birthday at Meli Estiatorio, and the experience was outstanding. They kindly accommodated our party of 25 on short notice, and the service was exceptional from start to finish. The staff was attentive, patient, and made us feel so welcome. On top of that, the food was absolutely delicious. We were thoroughly impressed and are already looking forward to returning. Truly a memorable evening!

The restaurant offers a pleasant ambiance and excellent cuisine, but the portion sizes are notably small considering the price point. This business model may struggle to remain competitive in the current market environment.
Food was amazing. Great Service. Nice atmosphere. Liz made sure service was top notch. Definitely coming back hereüëç

First time coming here and the food was delicious. Atmosphere was calm and welcoming. Our waitress Liz took care of us so well, service was amazing. She told us the best dishes to order, pretty much all of them lol! I‚Äôm very picky when it comes to Mediterranean style cuisine and this was a 10/10. They make delicious house made olives and fresh pita bread to start that is out of this world. Definitely coming back and would highly recommend!
Lamb burger was juicy and will get it again! Love the high ceiling and open space. Very impressed with the restaurant‚Äôs ambiance!

Good atmosphere and really good food.  Portions are a bit on the small side and somewhat overpriced for the size.  On a recent Friday night, (August 2025), service was really slow and poorly coordinated while ordering.
Honestly food was delicious, service was 10/10, surprised by every course on the quality and flavor! A great place to take friends and a date! Some nights have a DJ and they do Brunch
Such a delightful experience. Food, drinks and dessert. Let‚Äôs not forget the service! Highly recommend !!!
Victoria was amazing.

Melis is the place to be on a Saturday night ! The bartender Alfonso was amazing !
Great service overall. Highly recommend.

Great food, timely and well mannered service.
Luxurious ambiance.
IS IT SOOO FUN GREAT SERVICE BARTENDER OUTSTANDING AND THE DRINKS PHENOMENAL RECOMMEND

I had an amazing experience here! The atmosphere was welcoming, the service was top-notch, and everything exceeded my expectations. A special shoutout to Alfonso, the bartender ‚Äî his attention to detail, friendly personality, and incredible cocktails made the night unforgettable. You can tell he truly cares about making every guest feel taken care of. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back and recommending this spot to friends and family!
Excellent service,  food delicious üòã
Our server Victoria was amazing in all her recommendations! The food was delicious, atmosphere was cozy but chic vibes. 10/10 recommend

Meli in Queens is a must visit. The service is incredible, the space is brand new and gorgeous with stylish light fixtures, and there is plenty of street parking. The wine list is vast and every cocktail we tried was amazing.

The food blew us away. The chicken wings, eggplant and zucchini chips, beet salad, and grilled calamari were unreal. Both the pasta and the swordfish entr√©es were cooked perfectly. The bathrooms were spotless which says a lot about their attention to detail.

High quality, amazing flavors, and great value. I cannot wait to come back.
Delicious food, beautiful ambiance and amazing service!
Great atmosphere and good cocktails. Portions are small and very overpriced. Would recommend to only get drinks here or just small bites (appetizers).

Such a great addition to the area!!!! The meli chips are out of this world!!!! Definitely recommend coming. The service and atmosphere were 10/10. Shout out to Liz for the excellent service. We we‚Äôll be back.
Good Mediterranean food, excellent service and spectacular drinks.

Where do I start? As soon as you walk in you are transported to Greece. The restaurant is beautiful. Our waitress was such a sweetheart, Victoria- thank you for such an amazing service! The food was so fresh and delicious, we just didn‚Äôt like the seabass entree but only because for us it was a bit fishy. Their taverna salad and spanakopita is a must! We will def be back and such a great addition to the neighborhood!
Nice little Greek restaurant food was good service was fine the cheesecake to die for

Came to celebrate an anniversary and was sat with a toast. The waitress was very accommodating, easy to ask questions, and very personable! The dessert was phenomenal, and every piece of our meals were wonderful!
Exceptional service and food. Halumi cheese and the Zucchini chips are my favorite. Went to try happy hour and Ended up staying 5 hrs. My new favorite restaurant in the neighborhood.
We had great time , food was fresh and deliciuos , people were friendly .

Fantastic addition to the area, lovely interior design. Food was so good! Definitely get the Meli chips and the octopus! Scallops were another stand out. By far the best prepared ribeye steak we‚Äôve had in the area.

Huge shout out to Liz! She is an absolute sweetheart and added to our lovely experience!

We were driving around and we found Meli. The restaurant is absolutely beautiful. The ambiance, service, and food is great! Liz made us feel part of Meli family. Every staff member treated us well. We had the steak, it was delicious, succulent, just perfect!! The steak was accompanied by french fries. The desserts were very delicious

Beautiful establishment, Andriana was incredibly kind and knowledgeable she let me try a few of the wines by the glass. The food was absolutely delicious. Authentic Greek food, abundant portions.
Raving about this new gem here in forest hills! Will be back!

Rec dishes/photos
Tuna tartare
Calamari
Sesame feta
Ribe eye
Lemon Chicken
Greek salad
Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

The Kalamari is great; the sauce is spicy but for only a glimmer of a moment. The gnocchi was fantastic. The salmon was a train wreck. My order: Medium Rare... What came was beyond well done; so dry it was crumbly. The second attempt was so raw it was nearly tartare. Never coming again, despite the good food. Drinks are mid.

This Greek restaurant is a fantastic spot for an unforgettable dining experience. The service is excellent and friendly, attentive, and never overbearing. The food is amazing, with every dish packed full of flavor. You can really taste how fresh the ingredients are, especially with the live seafood display, which is such a nice touch.

The interior is beautiful, with a warm and inviting atmosphere that makes you want to settle in and enjoy your meal. The menu is extensive, so there‚Äôs something for everyone, whether you‚Äôre into classic Greek dishes or something a little different. And the live DJ adds the perfect vibe, making the whole experience even better.

Great food, great atmosphere, and great entertainment, I‚Äôll definitely be back!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Meli Estiatorio with my aunt this past Wednesday, and it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment we walked in, the beautiful ambience and aesthetic of the restaurant captivated us‚Äîit was truly pleasing to the eye.

Our waiter, Geraldo, was exceptional. He provided amazing suggestions for both appetizers and entr√©es, and his wine recommendations perfectly complemented our meal. Every dish we tried was superb, showcasing the authentic flavors of Greek cuisine.

If you're looking for a delightful dining experience with fantastic service and a beautiful atmosphere, Meli Estiatorio is the place to go! Can't wait to return!

Meli Estiatorio is an upscale Greek restaurant in a gorgeous setting, right on Metropolitan Avenue in Forest Hills. The food and service is extraordinary! The Meli chips, lamb chops and octopus are excellent. Great cocktails too!
Don‚Äôt wait for a special occasion, go now.

Solid upscale Greek restaurant. Walked in with my wife and 1 year old early on a Friday night. Cocktails, food, and service were all good. Seems like it gets louder and maybe clubby later at night. Good spot for a special occasion. Expect Manhattan prices and vibes.

Restaurant Review: Meli Estiatorio in Forest Hills

Meli Estiatorio is a stunning new addition to Forest Hills, offering an unforgettable Greek dining experience. From the moment you step inside, you‚Äôre transported to a Mediterranean paradise. The d√©cor is breathtaking, with vibrant flowers cascading from the ceiling and a huge, inviting bar anchoring the space. A DJ was spinning great music, adding a lively, upscale vibe to the evening.

The food was nothing short of spectacular. Every dish was bursting with authentic flavors and freshness. The oysters were unbelievably fresh, the octopus perfectly tender and flavorful, and the saganaki was a showstopper. Their extensive menu of Greek specialties left us wanting to try everything. The Dover sole, however, stole the show‚Äîeasily the freshest, most delicious preparation I‚Äôve ever had.

Make sure to save room for dessert because Meli‚Äôs Greek offerings are divine, the perfect sweet ending to an incredible meal.

The service was outstanding‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and impressively seamless, especially for opening night. It‚Äôs rare to see a restaurant operating so smoothly right out of the gate. Plus, the added convenience of valet parking makes the experience even better.

Meli Estiatorio is a must-visit for anyone craving exceptional Greek cuisine in a gorgeous setting. I can‚Äôt wait to go back!

My boyfriend and I got a takeout meal here today and it was absolutely delicious. We got the zucchini chips, crab cake, octopus, and the chicken entree. Everything was so good, but special shout out to the zucchini chips and octopus :) a little pricey but the portions are great. We‚Äôve tried some very high end Mediterranean places in the city and this is absolutely a strong contender. Phone service was also friendly and easy. So happy we have such a delicious restaurant nearby, will definitely be back!!!
Bravo! I had a great experience out with friends for my birthday.  Great drinks and portions! The food was divine! Can't wait to bring more friends!

What a great find.  We stopped in and were so pleased that we did the food and drinks were excellent and the service was impeccable. Liz was our waitress and was so sweet and accommodating.  Look them up on Instagram.  They have live entertainment on the weekends and a weekend brunch.  We will definitely be back.

Awesome vibe, friendly staff and great menu with high quality, flavorful ingredients. We were amazed by the extensive wine list ‚Äî great selection and reasonably priced. We enjoyed a Cotes de Beaune Burgundy pinot noir. Tuna tartare,‚Ä¶

We both thoroughly enjoyed our individual meals. Everything was fresh and well seasoned.  Beautiful ambience and plenty of room. The wait staff were all very accommodating. We will definitely be returning.

Have lived in Forest Hills my whole life and love that Meli has joined our community. The food was delicious and all of the ingredients were very fresh (Greek salad, lemon potatoes, branzino). Liz and Victor provided impeccable service and were extremely attentive. I had three cocktails and would recommend all three (Meli Lust, Mystic Mist and Dark & Salty). Will be back Saturday night as I was informed they have a DJ (very needed on Metro in FH).

Absolutely obsessed with this place. I walked into Meli and immediately felt like I was on vacation somewhere in the Mediterranean. The ambiance is just stunning‚Äîwarm, glowy lighting, earthy tones, and every little detail feels so thoughtfully designed. It‚Äôs chic without trying too hard, and honestly one of the most gorgeous spaces I‚Äôve seen in Queens. I couldn‚Äôt stop looking around! Perfect for date night or just treating yourself to a beautiful night out. I‚Äôm still thinking about it.
HIGHLY recommend you go and have dinner or lunch here. Everything was fresh, tasteful and reached beyond my expectations!! The vibe and atmosphere ‚ú®Ô∏è hard to match!! Go!

Okay the only reason why I gave 4 stars on the food is just that I ordered a side of broccoli rabe and they didn‚Äôt Blanche it correctly it was crazy bitter. Other than that they happily took it back in exchange for the Brussel sprouts which were actually life changing. I kid you not I had to stop eating the rest of my food, and say ‚ÄúOh my god‚Äù my girlfriend looked at me in shock thinking it was bad cause I‚Äôm very critical on food. But I was sent to a flavor heaven, the perfect combination of sweet, salty, bitter, crispy and soft all in one bite. Thank you for this experience!!

Amazing dining experience! Meli knows how to bring traditional Mediterranean dining to a higher level, while still maintaining the authenticity. The drinks are amazing, recommend the Dark & Salty (a refined espresso martini). The food came hot and in a timely manner, and you can taste the freshness of the ingredients. The wait staff were friendly and professional while also providing insight on the menu. Phenomenal new gem in Forest Hills. Will be going here more often!

A Wonderful Greek Experience!

I had the pleasure of dining at Meli Estiatorio, and it truly blew me away! The Greek food was absolutely delicious‚Äîeach dish was full of flavor and freshness. The service was fantastic, with the staff making us feel so welcome and well taken care of. The interior is just stunning, creating the perfect atmosphere for a relaxed and enjoyable meal. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more!

I had a fantastic evening at Meli where the combination of delicious cocktails and Mediterranean cuisine made for an unforgettable experience. The ambiance was vibrant and inviting, perfect for enjoying a night out.

The cocktail menu was impressive, featuring a variety of creative drinks that perfectly complemented the Mediterranean theme. I tried the Mediterranean Mule, which was refreshing with a delightful mix of vodka, ginger beer, and a hint of mint. My friend ordered the Meli classic and it was equally fabulous‚Äîsweet and tangy with a beautiful presentation.

We paired our cocktails with a selection of small plates, including calamari and spanakopita, which were both delicious. The flavors were bright and fresh, making the perfect accompaniment to our drinks.

The staff was knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the cocktails, providing great recommendations that enhanced our experience.

Meli  offers a fantastic cocktail selection that pairs beautifully with their Mediterranean fare. I highly recommend visiting for a fun night out!
We‚Äôve frequented many Greek restaurants in the city and Long Island‚Ä¶.Meli does not disappoint!! Food is delicious. Drinks are great. Staff is friendly. Welcome to Queens!
Love Meli!!! The food is so delicious and well made and the service is always amazing. We love Andreana especially. She is the sweetest‚ù§Ô∏è

Food was fantastic! We have eagerly been waiting to eat here, and they did not disappoint. Me and my wife used to dine here when it was Alberto‚Äôs and we were shocked to see how the new decor is at Meli. Forrest Hills needed a a new place that has very good food. The swordfish was incredible, the tuna tartar was the best I‚Äôve ever had . Thank you Meli keep it up! Love that there‚Äôs a place in the neighborhood that cares about quality over quantity. Plus you save me a trip to Long Island.

Is our first time coming here is beautiful restaurant ! Service is on point  everyone is very kind and sweet , but let talk about the most important thing too FOOD , it was delicious we order diferent dishes. Octopus shrimp branzino  ! I have to say it‚Äôs as 10/10 , I‚Äôm in love with this place and Thursday Friday and Saturday is dj at night. CAnt wait to come back
